name: Meet Me Where I Am - Ben Kessler

metadata.description:
i started “Meet Me Where I Am” at the beginning of this year as a series of verses about feeling like a stranger to myself. a lot of things in my life were suddenly in flux - and all of the things that usually keep me grounded felt like they were slipping through my hands. i was anxious that when the dust settled, nothing would feel the same again - that i’d never find the comfort & calm i’d become used to and that my relationships with family and friends would never be the same. this song is like an open letter to the people in my life - pleading that they will stick around when things settle.

in early september I minted the stems of “Meet Me Where I Am” with on-chain DAW Arpeggi (https://www.arpeggi.io) as one of the first artists to use their “clips” feature. it has been inspiring to see the bones of this song used in so many different ways - and to see all these stems repurposed on-chain. i’m thrilled to bring “Meet Me Where I Am” to Sound to bring this song in its original form to as many people as possible.

written & produced by ben kessler

lyrics.text:
i get angry when i'm tired
i'm too high to fall asleep
i hear marching in the distance
i think they're coming here for me
throw your jacket on the table
meet your hand grabbing the seat
it feels like flesh and it feels fatal
watching you from 1000 ft
there’s poison in the water

there’s a stranger in my skin
if i never come back to myself can you meet me where i am?

i think the universe is angry
i see it on TV
i feel it in roof of my mouth
its all the space under my feet
and i don't wanna keep loving u in cycles
i’ve been running for way too many miles
with my eyes closed
it’s a race that i can’t beat

there’s poison in the water
there’s a stranger in my skin
if i never come back to myself can you meet me where i am?

metadata.name: Meet Me Where I Am #1
metadata.title: Meet Me Where I Am
